name.da: Jogo de Bacia Retrô na Escola
name.ja: 学校でのレトロボウル

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Play Retro Bowl at school as a Chrome extension - Try it now!
short.de: Spielen Sie Retro Bowl in der Schule als Chrome-Erweiterung - Probieren Sie es jetzt aus!
short.el,es,no: ¡Juega a Retro Bowl en la escuela como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Mängi Retro Bowl'i koolis Chrome'i laiendusena - proovi kohe järgi!
short.fil: Maglaro ng Retro Bowl sa paaralan bilang Chrome extension - Subukan mo ngayon!
short.fr: Jouez à Retro Bowl à l'école avec une extension Chrome - Essayez-le maintenant!
short.hi: Jugar Retro Bowl en la escuela como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.hu: Játssz a Retro Bowl nevű játékkal az iskolában Chrome-bővítményként - Próbáld ki most!
short.it: Gioca a Retro Bowl a scuola come estensione di Chrome - Provalo ora!
short.ja: 学校でChrome拡張機能としてRetro Bowlをプレイしてみてください！
short.ko: 학교에서 Chrome 확장 프로그램으로 Retro Bowl을 플레이하세요 - 지금 바로 시도해보세요!
short.ms: Jouez à Retro Bowl à l'école en tant qu'extension Chrome - Essayez-le maintenant!
short.nl: Speel Retro Bowl op school als een Chrome-extensie - Probeer het nu!
short.ro: Joaca Retro Bowl la scoala ca extensie Chrome - Incearca acum!
short.ru: Играйте в Retro Bowl в школе как расширение Chrome - Попробуйте сейчас!
short.sl: Igrajte Retro Bowl v šoli kot razširitev Chrome - Poskusite zdaj!
short.sr: Играјте Retro Bowl u školi kao Chrome ekstenziju - Isprobajte sada!
short.sv: Spela Retro Bowl i skolan som en Chrome-tillägg - Prova nu!
short.th: เล่น Retro Bowl ที่โรงเรียนเป็นส่วนขยาย Chrome - ลองเลย!
short.tr: Okulu Chrome eklentisi olarak Retro Bowl oyna - Şimdi dene!
short.uk: [fr] Jouez à Retro Bowl à l'école en tant qu'extension Chrome - Essayez maintenant!
short.vi: Chơi Retro Bowl tại trường như một tiện ích Chrome - Hãy thử ngay!
short.zh_CN: 在学校里作为 Chrome 扩展程序玩 Retro Bowl 游戏 - 现在就试试吧！
short.zh_TW: 在學校使用 Chrome 擴充功能玩 Retro Bowl - 現在試試看！

long.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,:
Get ready for a blast from the past right in your school Chrome browser with "Retro Bowl at School" Chrome Extension! 🏈

Relive the excitement of classic American football gaming during your school breaks. Dive into addictive gameplay, customize your team, and tackle progressively challenging opponents. 🎮

Designed to be discreet and school-friendly, enjoy gaming without interruptions to your studies. No downloads needed—just install and play instantly. 🚀

Bring the nostalgia of retro gaming to your school desk with Retro Bowl at School Chrome Extension. Install now and kick off the fun!

# Play more games on the top-left menu.
long.bg,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fi,fil,fr,he,hi,:
To win Uno, you must be the first player to get rid of all the cards in your hand. Choose your avatar, play your best game, and start the fun!

How to play:

Use your mouse to play cards.
Match the color or number of the top card on the discard pile.
Use action cards to change the direction of play, force your opponents to draw cards, or skip their turns.
Be the first player to get rid of all your cards to win!

Classic Uno game features:

5+ characters to choose from
Easy controls
Minimal animation
2D graphics

- Play others games on the top-left menu
